about_the_game:
10 Blaze Escape is an escape horror game that will thrill and challenge you. You step into a dark maze and aim to light 10 flames to escape.

However, terrifying ghosts roam the maze, and if they find you, they will chase you at an unbelievable speed. Perhaps you will sit back in amazement. Hey, get up, get up! Quickly get out of here! A thrilling adventure awaits you as you navigate through the narrow streets and out of the eyes of the ghosts.


- Thrilling gameplay: Proceed carefully in the maze to avoid detection by the ghosts. Tension surrounds you.

- Three difficulty levels: “Easy”, “Base”, and the ultimate challenge “Very Hard” for beginners and experts alike. In Very Hard mode, your clear time will be reflected in your world ranking (Steam Leaderboard).

- Beautiful Graphics and Music: Beautiful graphics to enhance your sense of fear and immersive music await you.

Now, push your limits in 10 Blaze Escape, solve the maze's riddles, and see if you can escape safely. This will be an unforgettable experience that will test your courage and wits.

---

name: 10 Blaze Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
